direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve form-related objects based on locale-specific keys.
Both methods handle locale-based key generation with similar control flows.
Both methods access and retrieve resources (forms and validator actions) based on keys.
Both methods modify the state of the ValidatorResources object by adding or retrieving form-related data.
Both methods handle exceptions related to resource processing and retrieval.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
